column1: Little Goat Diner////The paratha with avocado salad is absolutely delicious. The paratha was amazing
column2: perfectly cooked with an authentic taste
column3: and this is coming from someone who is from the land of parathas. I was very skeptical about it trying it
column4: but boy am I glad I did. The dish blew me away. The eggs and salad that came with it meshed perfectly in flavor. I've found my go-to healthy paratha fix!!
